```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(tmap)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
plumes <- read.csv(here::here("data", "plumes.csv"))
world <- read_sf(here::here("data", "gadm_410.gdb"))
```

```{r}
# Make sf 
plumes <- st_as_sf(plumes, coords = c('plume_longitude', 'plume_latitude'))
```

Mapping Plumes
```{r}
tm_shape(plumes) + 
  tm_dots()
```
Looking at Sectors emission avg for CO2 and CH4
```{r}
plumes %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  group_by(ipcc_sector, gas) %>% 
  summarise(mean = mean(emission_auto, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ungroup()
  
```
